fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Triple Tap (3-shot): If you use this ability in combination with your factional kill, you will attack the target three times: two basic attacks, then a powerful attack.
~ Payback (2-shot): If you are visited by a one-target non-Astral ability the night you use this, you will use the same ability on the person who used it on you, along with a basic attack.
